name: Andrélon Classic Shampoo Iedere Dag
composition: INGREDIËNTEN: Aqua, Sodium Laureth Sulfate, Cocamidopropyl Betaine, Sodium Chloride, Helianthus Annuus Seed Oil (Zonnebloemolie), Parfum, Sodium Benzoate, Citric Acid, Guar Hydroxypropyltrimonium Chloride, Disodium EDTA, PPG-6, Sodium Hydroxide, Amyl Cinnamal, Benzyl Alcohol, Benzyl Benzoate, Coumarin, Hexyl Cinnamal, Limonene, Linalool, CI 19140, CI 42090.
